text: Francesco Girardi (born 1 November 1966) is an Italian equestrian. He competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Francesco Girardi
